title: Dunkmaster Darius
body: OK so i play basketball and I just love the sport. As i was just browsing the skins in the store i noticed Dunk master {{champion:122}} and he looked cool and all but i don't find the time to save up to get him and the skin. Is it worth it? Should i get it even though i don't really play Darius that much but have the will to play him for awhile if i get the skin, if you know what i mean. Thanks for reading.

replies.body: Hello there I'm a darius main who only plays with the dunkmaster skin and I can tell you both the champ and the skin are definitely WORTH. You will have so much fun DUNKING your opponents it's literally the best feeling :)
